stories.original_headline: AI uncovers the hidden genetic control centers driving Alzheimer’s
stories.original_summary: Scientists have created the most detailed maps yet of how genes control one another inside the brains of people with Alzheimer’s disease. stories.fantasy_headline: Wise Wizards Unravel the Mystery of the Mind-Fog Affliction!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists and Royal Wizards have charted the deepest secrets of the mind-fog affliction. Using a powerful, enchanted scrying orb, they've mapped the intricate spirit-lines within the brains of those afflicted. This grand discovery reveals how the very essence of life controls itself, offering new hope for a cure.

stories.original_headline: Scientists found a way to plant ideas in dreams to boost creativity
stories.original_summary: Sleeping on a problem might be more powerful than we ever imagined. stories.fantasy_headline: Dreamweavers Discover Secret to Unleash Creativity Through Slumber!
stories.fantasy_story: The elusive Dreamweavers' Guild has revealed a startling truth: dreams can be guided to awaken great ingenuity. By enchanting slumbering minds with subtle whispers, their scholars have learned to plant seeds of inspiration. This ancient magic can help bards craft new songs and artisans forge wondrous creations, boosting creativity across the lands.

stories.original_headline: I hate my AI pet with every fiber of my being
stories.original_summary: After a few weeks living with Casio's AI-powered pet, Moflin, I finally understand why my mother hated my Furby so much. stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Familiars Prove More Vexing Than Companionable!
stories.fantasy_story: The Artificers' Clan recently unveiled their new line of enchanted companion creatures, small furry constructs meant to bring joy. However, many owners now report these 'Moflin' familiars are more of a nuisance than a delight. Their constant squeaks and twitches prove quite vexing, leading some to miss their simple, non-animated pets.

stories.original_headline: Logitech’s new Superstrike is a faster, more customizable gaming mouse
stories.original_summary: Enthusiast gaming keyboard tech has made the jump to gaming mice - well, to one gaming mouse so far. stories.fantasy_headline: Artisans Craft Faster, More Adaptable Arcane Game Orbs!
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Artisans' Clan has unveiled a marvel for tournament players: the 'Superstrike' Arcane Control Orb. This enchanted artifact uses induction sensing crystals, making reactions far swifter than traditional devices. Adventurers can now customize their spell-casting and movement with unprecedented precision during thrilling wizard duels.
